statements: SELECT vendor_name, total_spent FROM vendor_spend_patterns;
SELECT * FROM vendor_spend_patterns WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT vendor_name, last_purchase_date FROM vendor_spend_patterns ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, total_spent, last_purchase_date FROM vendor_spend_patterns WHERE total_spent < 5000 ORDER BY vendor_id ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, cost_saving_opportunities FROM vendor_spend_patterns WHERE total_spent > 500 ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_spend_patterns ORDER BY vendor_name DESC, total_spent ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, total_spent FROM vendor_spend_patterns WHERE total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC
SELECT vendor_name, total_spent FROM vendor_spend_patterns WHERE last_purchase_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, total_spent, last_purchase_date FROM vendor_spend_patterns WHERE cost_saving_opportunities ILIKE '%discount%'
SELECT * FROM vendor_spend_patterns WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%' AND (total_spent < 5000 OR last_purchase_date < '2021-02-01')
SELECT vendor_name, total_spend FROM vendor_spend
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders WHERE order_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, total_spend FROM vendor_spend ORDER BY total_spend DESC
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount < 1000
SELECT vendor_name, total_spend FROM vendor_spend WHERE total_spend > 5000
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, total_spend FROM vendor_spend
SELECT * FROM vendor_spend WHERE total_spend > 1000
SELECT vendor_name, total_spend FROM vendor_spend ORDER BY total_spend DESC
SELECT vendor_name, SUM(total_spend) AS total_spend_sum FROM vendor_spend GROUP BY vendor_name
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM vendor_spend JOIN purchase_orders ON vendor_spend.vendor_id = purchase_orders.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING order_count > 2
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM vendors WHERE vendor_location = 'New York';
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT opportunity_id, opportunity_description, estimated_savings FROM savings_opportunities WHERE estimated_savings > 1000;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_location = 'New York';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, purchase_amount FROM vendors JOIN purchases ON vendors.vendor_id = purchases.vendor_id;
SELECT vendor_name, opportunity_description FROM vendors JOIN savings_opportunities ON vendors.vendor_id = savings_opportunities.vendor_id WHERE estimated_savings > 5000;
SELECT vendor_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchases FROM vendors JOIN purchases ON vendors.vendor_id = purchases.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING total_purchases > 10000;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, email_address FROM vendors;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, phone_number, contact_person FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, unit_cost FROM order_details WHERE order_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, email_address FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, phone_number FROM vendors WHERE contact_person LIKE '%John%';
SELECT p.product_name, od.quantity, od.unit_cost FROM products p JOIN order_details od ON p.product_id = od.product_id;
SELECT v.vendor_name, COUNT(po.order_id) AS total_orders FROM vendors v LEFT JOIN purchase_orders po ON v.vendor_id = po.vendor_id GROUP BY v.vendor_name;
SELECT * FROM vendor_spending;
SELECT vendor_name, spend_amount FROM vendor_spending ORDER BY spend_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM purchase_orders WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT vendor_name, month, year, total_spend FROM vendor_spending JOIN spend_analysis ON vendor_spending.vendor_id = spend_analysis.vendor_id WHERE month = 10 AND year = 2021;
SELECT * FROM vendor_spending ORDER BY vendor_id DESC, vendor_name ASC
SELECT vendor_name, spend_amount FROM vendor_spending WHERE spend_amount > 1000 ORDER BY spend_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT vendor_name, SUM(spend_amount) AS total_spend FROM vendor_spending GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING total_spend > 5000
SELECT p.product_name, pi.quantity, pi.total_price FROM product_catalog p JOIN purchase_items pi ON p.product_id = pi.product_id ORDER BY pi.total_price DESC
